Title: Homogenization and nonlinearity enhancement of 2D graphene-based metasurfaces
Abstract: © OSA 2018.A general homogenization technique is developed to study the optical properties of 2D graphene-based metasurfaces. The results show the effective nonlinear susceptibilities of graphene metasurfaces can be enhanced by more than two orders of magnitude.
